title: Metrostroi Extensions spawner settings
description: Spawner settings as json. Used in presets and just simple settings saving

entityClass.description: Entity class that would be spawned (e.g. gmod_subway_81-717_mvm_custom)

wagonCount.description: Amount of wagons that would be spawned. Although you can set this in preset, it's not recommened. Used in latest.json preset, which contains last selected settings for specific entityClass

options.description: Spawner options that would be used for spawning. If option specified here is absent on user's client it's just silently ignored
